programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Squirrel Surprise / Paddington Becomes a Secret Agent) S2 (2/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Squirrel Surprise / Paddington Becomes a Secret Agent»Paddington accidentally destroys a squirrel's winter nut store, so he invites the wild animal to live indoors. Judy gets a toy spy kit. // Mrs. Bird starts acting suspiciously, so the children and Paddington decide to follow her using the spy gadets.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Clowns Around / Paddington and the Bad Swap) S2 (3/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Clowns Around / Paddington and the Bad Swap»Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day? // Paddington accidentally gives away Jonathan's rare Tiny Robot card in a game of Imaginarium. How will he get it back?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La vétérinaire volante) S4 (13/52)
programme.desc: «La vétérinaire volante»The Flying Vet: Doctor Hamster is having a busy day - there are lots of helpless animals that need her help!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Kylie Kangeroo) S5 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Kylie Kangeroo»Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Capitaine Papa Dog) S4 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Capitaine Papa Dog»Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le parc aux dinosaures de Papy Rabbit) S4 (16/52)
programme.desc: «Le parc aux dinosaures de Papy Rabbit»Peppa and her friends are celebrating Freddy Fox's birthday at Grampy Rabbit's dinosaur themed park. Grampy takes them on a wild adventure and shows them some singing dinosaurs. The gang then follows dinosaur footprints to find a special surprise.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Le Mystère du Guppy Express) S6 (23/29)
programme.desc: «Le Mystère du Guppy Express»Mystery On The Guppy Express!: When Oona's Bubble Kitty goes missing aboard the Guppy Express, Detective Nonny steps in to help. Is Bubble Kitty lost for good? (S6, ep 10).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La fête costumée de Blue) S1 (19/20)
programme.desc: «La fête costumée de Blue»Everyone's dressed up in silly costumes for our BIG costume parade, but we don't know what costume Blue wants to wear! As we play Blue's Clues to figure it out, we help Shovel make a truck-tastic costume and skidoo into Jill's puppet theater play!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (L'arc-en-ciel de Blue) S2 (n°14)
programme.desc: «L'arc-en-ciel de Blue»We're playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play on this rainy day! We help Josh get dressed in his rainy-day clothes and skidoo to learn how rainbows are formed. We even meet a real rainbow!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Fruit Festival / Abuelo's Treasure) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «The Fruit Festival / Abuelo's Treasure»Enrique steals all the fruit in 'The Fruit Festival', then in 'Abuelo's Treasure', the crew is on a mission to rescue Abuelo's long lost treasure. (S2, ep 6).

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Chickcharney Island) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Chickcharney Island»Return to Merlandia: The crew return to Merlandia for an underwater fair, but must save the day when the power grid becomes overloaded. (S2, ep 8b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La punaise d'eau) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «La punaise d'eau»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Coach Grandma) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Coach Grandma»Coach Grandma: Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. (S1, ep 14a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Lemonade) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Lemonade»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest) S9 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest»With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Lamp Post) S1 (25/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Lamp Post»Paddington And The Lamp Post: Pigeonton has nested in a lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop, but the council has condemned it! (S1, ep 24b).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Freddy Fox) S3 (27/52)
programme.desc: «Freddy Fox»Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Apprendre à siffler) S3 (28/52)
programme.desc: «Apprendre à siffler»Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride, where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets. Meanwhile Pedro keeps losing his ticket.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La tortue de la doctoresse Hamster) S3 (29/52)
programme.desc: «La tortue de la doctoresse Hamster»Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets. But Tiddles has run away. But Ms. Rabbit is going to rescue Tiddles.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Surprise) S1 (n°43)
programme.desc: «The Surprise»They decide to organise a surprise party on the hill. The organisation gets out of hand when Bubu's invitation cards fly away, Ron gets distracted in writing a heartfelt poem and Christopher tries to resist to eat the strawberry pie he baked.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Paperplane Race) S1 (n°44)
programme.desc: «The Paperplane Race»Everyone is bored today, so Bubu organises a paper plane race! Anna, Froga, Ron and Bubu need to create their own special paper planes. To everyone surprise, Froga and Bubu are still in the race.... Who will win?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue a beaucoup d'imagination) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Blue a beaucoup d'imagination»Imagine along with Josh and Blue in this game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue envisions a mysterious shape to be. We listen to a story created by Slippery, Magenta and Tickety and help Mr. Salt discover his own imagination!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art) S9 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art»Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le nid d'abeilles) S2 (12/26)
programme.desc: «Le nid d'abeilles»When the PAW Patrol discovers a beehive in Cap'n Turbot's lighthouse, Ryder and the pups must work together to find the bees a new home.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Den Build Disaster / Winter Lights) S2 (19/20)
programme.desc: «Den Build Disaster / Winter Lights»Kai tries to impress with his super den, but his leaf blower invention frightens the baby animals. // Lola's plan to help a family of hedgehogs over the winter doesn't go to plan when Sir Steel wants to brighten things up.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Poisson légendaire / Bulles à gogo) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Le Poisson légendaire / Bulles à gogo»When Ian is on holidays, Lola takes over as a park ranger for a day, but that is not easy. Mister Staal tries to clean Middenbos with a huge soap machine and creates one big bubble nightmare!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Celebrates Mrs Birds Day / Paddington the Table Tennis Champ!) S2 (4/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Celebrates Mrs Birds Day / Paddington the Table Tennis Champ!»It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation? // Paddington & Mateo form a table tennis team and the beat the table hogs so everyone can play!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Banana) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Banana»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie»Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...»Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Danse à contre courant / Le Sorcier Glacé) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Danse à contre courant / Le Sorcier Glacé»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Best Fin-Ship Day) S1 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Best Fin-Ship Day»Best Fin-Ship Day: Baby Shark tries to give William the best Best Fin-ship Day ever. (S1, ep 17a).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (King for a Day) S1 (n°41)
programme.desc: «King for a Day»Today the friends play King For A Day, someone throws the crown on Christopher's head! Then the crown leaves his head and ends on his cousin, Benjy, who just came for a day visit. Benjy only wants to play with his cousin, and do whatever he wants.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Give-Away Day) S1 (45/78)
programme.desc: «Give-Away Day»Froga gets a new beautiful Sunflower Plant and decides to put it in her greenhouse. But she realizes that has been using her greenhouse to store all the items she doesn't know what to do with anymore. Now there's no room for her plant!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Mystery Present) S1 (37/78)
programme.desc: «The Mystery Present»Bubu, Froga and Anna are looking for Anna's Ukulele, a bouncy ball and another item belonging to Froga. When searching, they find a beautiful present. Why is it here? Who is it for? What's inside? Our friends are planning to find out!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Friendship Bouquet) S1 (38/78)
programme.desc: «The Friendship Bouquet»Froga is devastated because her sunflowers have withered in her garden and she cannot make her annual sunflower bouquet. Luckily, Anna, with her friends, searches for a solution to replace Froga's cherished sunflowers with something better!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Leaf Portraits) S1 (n°39)
programme.desc: «Leaf Portraits»When Ron discovers that some leaves resemble his friends, like clouds are making shapes in the sky. Anna, Froga and Christopher are amazed by his discoveries. The leaves are blown away, and the wind takes the "Leaf Portraits".

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Vegetable Pie) S1 (42/78)
programme.desc: «The Vegetable Pie»Froga's strawberries are sick so she's going to miss this year's vegetable picking. When Bubu offers her a walkie-talkie to use, she agrees to let him baby-sit her sick plant for her. But soon, Froga loses confidence in Bubu's ability to help.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mer, soleil et neige) S3 (30/52)
programme.desc: «Mer, soleil et neige»La famille de Peppa organise une excursion à la mer afin de bâtir des châteaux de sable sur la plage, mais à leur arrivée, il y a de la neige...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ordinateur de papy Pig) S3 (31/52)
programme.desc: «L'ordinateur de papy Pig»Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'hôpital) S3 (32/52)
programme.desc: «L'hôpital»Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les fruits) S4 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Les fruits»Fruit: It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'hélicoptère de mademoiselle Rabbit) S3 (34/52)
programme.desc: «L'hélicoptère de mademoiselle Rabbit»Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Bébé Alexandre) S3 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Bébé Alexandre»Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le phare de Papy Rabbit) S3 (36/52)
programme.desc: «Le phare de Papy Rabbit»Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Double Dare You) S1 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Double Dare You»On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Super-constructeurs, super-sauveurs) S4 (13/20)
programme.desc: «Super-constructeurs, super-sauveurs»Blaze, Starla and Stripes transform into construction vehicles to help Pauline build her pizza parlor. Crusher and Pickle also get to work; they build a high tower.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La fonte du glacier) S4 (4/20)
programme.desc: «La fonte du glacier»When a little bunny gets trapped on top of a melting glacier, Blaze must put his new robot powers to the test as he races to the rescue.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le cygne gonflable / Le lav'animaux) S8 (23/24)
programme.desc: «Le cygne gonflable / Le lav'animaux»The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable. // Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus / Pups Save the Hummy Gummies) S8 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus / Pups Save the Hummy Gummies»Everybody loves Helga Humdinger's Hummy Gummy treats, causing Mayor Humdinger to get jealous and steal them all.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Kai Express / Ducknado) S1 (4/15)
programme.desc: «Kai Express / Ducknado»When Kai joins all the deer's carts together, the vehicles end up as a runaway train in the Central Forest! // Sir Steel's super powerful hairdryer creates a giant tornado that sucks up Ian, his ducklings and a heap of other things.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Crystal Catastrophe) S2 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Crystal Catastrophe»Crystal Catastrophe: Dinky the baby turtle is given a special courage crystal by Jade but Sir Steel thinks will boost his Mech Suit's powers. (S2, ep 8a).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Squirrel Surprise / Paddington Becomes a Secret Agent) S2 (2/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Squirrel Surprise / Paddington Becomes a Secret Agent»Paddington accidentally destroys a squirrel's winter nut store, so he invites the wild animal to live indoors. Judy gets a toy spy kit. // Mrs. Bird starts acting suspiciously, so the children and Paddington decide to follow her using the spy gadets.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Clowns Around / Paddington and the Bad Swap) S2 (3/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Clowns Around / Paddington and the Bad Swap»Paddington throws a Birthday party for Mateo but things don't go to plan, will Mrs. Brown's clown act save the day? // Paddington accidentally gives away Jonathan's rare Tiny Robot card in a game of Imaginarium. How will he get it back?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La vétérinaire volante) S4 (13/52)
programme.desc: «La vétérinaire volante»The Flying Vet: Doctor Hamster is having a busy day - there are lots of helpless animals that need her help!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Kylie Kangeroo) S5 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Kylie Kangeroo»Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey. Peppa shows Kylie how to jump up and down in muddy puddles, but who can jump the highest?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Capitaine Papa Dog) S4 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Capitaine Papa Dog»Mummy Dog and Danny are very excited! Captain Daddy Dog is home from the sea, and he's bearing gifts! What can they be?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le parc aux dinosaures de Papy Rabbit) S4 (16/52)
programme.desc: «Le parc aux dinosaures de Papy Rabbit»Peppa and her friends are celebrating Freddy Fox's birthday at Grampy Rabbit's dinosaur themed park. Grampy takes them on a wild adventure and shows them some singing dinosaurs. The gang then follows dinosaur footprints to find a special surprise.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Le Mystère du Guppy Express) S6 (23/29)
programme.desc: «Le Mystère du Guppy Express»Mystery On The Guppy Express!: When Oona's Bubble Kitty goes missing aboard the Guppy Express, Detective Nonny steps in to help. Is Bubble Kitty lost for good? (S6, ep 10).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La fête costumée de Blue) S1 (19/20)
programme.desc: «La fête costumée de Blue»Everyone's dressed up in silly costumes for our BIG costume parade, but we don't know what costume Blue wants to wear! As we play Blue's Clues to figure it out, we help Shovel make a truck-tastic costume and skidoo into Jill's puppet theater play!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (L'arc-en-ciel de Blue) S2 (n°14)
programme.desc: «L'arc-en-ciel de Blue»We're playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play on this rainy day! We help Josh get dressed in his rainy-day clothes and skidoo to learn how rainbows are formed. We even meet a real rainbow!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Fruit Festival / Abuelo's Treasure) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «The Fruit Festival / Abuelo's Treasure»Enrique steals all the fruit in 'The Fruit Festival', then in 'Abuelo's Treasure', the crew is on a mission to rescue Abuelo's long lost treasure. (S2, ep 6).

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Chickcharney Island) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Chickcharney Island»Return to Merlandia: The crew return to Merlandia for an underwater fair, but must save the day when the power grid becomes overloaded. (S2, ep 8b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Les billets perdus) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Les billets perdus»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Coach Grandma) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Coach Grandma»Coach Grandma: Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. (S1, ep 14a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Lemonade) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Lemonade»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest) S9 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest»With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Lamp Post) S1 (25/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Lamp Post»Paddington And The Lamp Post: Pigeonton has nested in a lamppost outside Mr. Gruber's shop, but the council has condemned it! (S1, ep 24b).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le chantier naval de papy Rabbit) S3 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Le chantier naval de papy Rabbit»Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Secouer, racler, taper) S3 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Secouer, racler, taper»Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa Pig, champion du monde) S3 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Papa Pig, champion du monde»Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Maître Christophe) S1 (47/78)
programme.desc: «Maître Christophe»Froga is so enamored with Super-Christopher, she decides that she wants to learn how to become Super-Froga! Christopher takes on the challenge of being her superhero instructor and after a rocky start, the two become terrific super partners.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (An Endless Story) S1 (n°48)
programme.desc: «An Endless Story»Anna is reading Christopher and Froga a story - but when she gets to the end, they discover the last two pages are missing! After a search for the missing pages, they find out that one of them is blank.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Let Justice Be Done / The Great Spring Clean»Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Raconte-nous un objet, Blue) S2 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Raconte-nous un objet, Blue»Sharpen your pencils, because Josh and Blue are going to SCHOOL! While Blue and her friends go through their school day, we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to share at Show and Tell.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger) S9 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger»When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Dinobot / Les Super Minis dans l'espace) S2 (20/20)
programme.desc: «Dinobot / Les Super Minis dans l'espace»Stu & Safia have a new pet which needs training - just one problem: it's a Dinobot and it takes the Deer Squad to stop it! // An adventure in space awaits the newest heroes in town when the Deer Squad take the Forest Squad with them on a mission.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Panique au jardin public / Complètement givré) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Panique au jardin public / Complètement givré»Rammy's tips about focus and meditation come in handy when Mister Staal's Replicator makes donuts rain in Midden Bos. When Kai takes out his Hydropower on an ice cream machine, it turns into an unhinged ice bot!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Big Decision / Paddington's Beach Stowaway) S2 (6/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Big Decision / Paddington's Beach Stowaway»On the last day of the school holidays Jonathan & Judy can't agree on what to do so Paddington has the casting vote. // The Browns come back from a beach trip with more than sand in their hair - why is that shell moving on its own?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Freeze Pops) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Freeze Pops»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Ma meilleure amie) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Ma meilleure amie»George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La halte-garderie) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «La halte-garderie»Peppa and George are going to daycare. It's George's first day at daycare, and he shows the class his interest in dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête de l'école) S1 (20/52)
programme.desc: «La fête de l'école»Peppa and her family go to the street fair at school and do all kinds of things there. Peppa and her friends have their face painted like tigers.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La leçon de danse) S1 (31/52)
programme.desc: «La leçon de danse»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'embouteillage) S2 (13/52)
programme.desc: «L'embouteillage»Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. On the way, Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig get caught in a very long traffic jam. They still haven't arrived by the time lunch is ready, so Grandpa Pig decides to bring the lunch to them - in his wheelbarrow. There's enough delicious food for everyone in the traffic jam.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Emilie Eléphant) S2 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Emilie Eléphant»There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La mare aux petits bateaux) S2 (12/52)
programme.desc: «La mare aux petits bateaux»Peppa and George learn that throwing waste away is fun, especially if you can divide it into special bins so that the waste can be reused. So recycle!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La vente de charité) S2 (19/52)
programme.desc: «La vente de charité»Peppa and George want to go to the playground with Papa and Mama Pig. But a fog sets in and they get lost. When Papa Pig thinks they are back home, the fog clears and they are... in the playground!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire d'Edmond l'éléphant) S3 (51/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire d'Edmond l'éléphant»Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Journée Internationale) S4 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Journée Internationale»Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le concours d'animaux) S4 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Le concours d'animaux»There is a pet competition at playgroup, and everyone has brought in their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but finds it hard to choose the best pet.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'aquarium) S4 (31/52)
programme.desc: «L'aquarium»The Aquarium: Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium. With all the different fish surely Peppa can find a new friend for Goldie?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Pedro le retardataire) S4 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Pedro le retardataire»The playgroup is going on a trip to the museum. Everyone, is on the bus ready to go. But where is Pedro Pony?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (En bateau) S4 (43/52)
programme.desc: «En bateau»Going Boating: Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, and have a race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Souvenirs de l'ancien temps) S4 (51/52)
programme.desc: «Souvenirs de l'ancien temps»Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. (Subtitled) (Audio Described) (Also in HD).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La garderie à domicile) S1 (30/52)
programme.desc: «La garderie à domicile»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La princesse fatiguée) S1 (36/52)
programme.desc: «La princesse fatiguée»Papa Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a sleepy princess. In the story Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mama Pig is the queen and Papa Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le concours de déguisements) S1 (38/52)
programme.desc: «Le concours de déguisements»Peppa and George have a party where everyone comes dressed up. Peppa is an elf princess and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to choose which of her friends is dressed up the best.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les marionnettes de Chloé) S1 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Les marionnettes de Chloé»Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloe's house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mon anniversaire) S1 (50/52)
programme.desc: «Mon anniversaire»It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La pièce de théâtre) S1 (52/52)
programme.desc: «La pièce de théâtre»Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mystères) S2 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Mystères»Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are watching their favourite television programme: "Detective Potato". Peppa and George want to be famous detectives too. So, Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George try to find him. Using a magnifying glass, Peppa and George follow a trail of cake crumbs to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le coucher) S2 (14/52)
programme.desc: «Le coucher»It's nearly time for bed. Peppa and George play outside for a tiny bit more. Then they are called in for their bath. After that, Peppa and George brush their teeth and get into bed, so Daddy Pig can read them a story. Soon they are fast asleep. Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig finally sit down to watch television, but it's been a long day and they are very sleepy too.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de George) S2 (26/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de George»C'est l'anniversaire de George. Maman et Papa Cochon lui offrent un jouet brontosaure. Puis ils se rendent au musée afin de voir d'autres spécimens de dinosaures...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le petit train de Papy Pig) S2 (32/52)
programme.desc: «Le petit train de Papy Pig»When Peppa's friends come to play in her tree house, it's super fun, but when the boys come, things go wrong. Peppa unceremoniously puts them out. Grandpa knows what to do and builds a castle hut for the boys, but whether it makes it more fun?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de Papa Pig) S2 (50/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de Papa Pig»Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Princesse Peppa) S3 (14/52)
programme.desc: «Princesse Peppa»Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camion de Monsieur Fox) S3 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Le camion de Monsieur Fox»When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van - even a chicken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jeu "Spéciale jour de pluie") S4 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Le jeu "Spéciale jour de pluie"»Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le parc aux dinosaures de Papy Rabbit) S4 (16/52)
programme.desc: «Le parc aux dinosaures de Papy Rabbit»Peppa and her friends are celebrating Freddy Fox's birthday at Grampy Rabbit's dinosaur themed park. Grampy takes them on a wild adventure and shows them some singing dinosaurs. The gang then follows dinosaur footprints to find a special surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une histoire pour George) S4 (17/52)
programme.desc: «Une histoire pour George»Bedtime Story: Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story to help them fall asleep. When George wakes up again Peppa has to make up a bedtime story to get him back to sleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jour de repos de mademoiselle Rabbit) S3 (37/52)
programme.desc: «Le jour de repos de mademoiselle Rabbit»Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket - and everywhere else she works!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le club secret) S3 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Le club secret»Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club - going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Roy) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Roy»1.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie»Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le Lion volant) S4 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Le Lion volant»Blaze and AJ are excited to play with their new friend Roarian, the Flying Lion! But when Roarian loses his magical sunstone, he turns into a statue! Now it's up to Blaze and AJ to find the sunstone and restore Roarian's powers!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Les robots dans l'espace) S4 (9/20)
programme.desc: «Les robots dans l'espace»When Space Commander Megan is marooned on Pluto, our robot heroes will race through wormholes, shoot past ice volcanoes, and blast straight through an asteroid field to bring their new friend back home.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand) S9 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand»When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost) S9 (12/25)
programme.desc: «Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost»Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch: When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. (S9, ep 12a).

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La Créature du lac / Collés ensemble) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «La Créature du lac / Collés ensemble»A shipment of plastic is dumped in the Crystal Lake. A lake monster appears and Rammy must overcome his fear of rednessing everyone. When Lola and Mister Steel get stuck together, they are forced to work together.
